properties.name: resilience4j.timelimiter.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Resilience4j's Time Limiter.

properties.name: resilience4j.bulkhead.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Resilience4j's Bulkhead.

properties.name: resilience4j.thread-pool-bulkhead.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Resilience4j's Thread Pool Bulkhead.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Resilience4j's Rate Limiter.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Resilience4j's Circuit Breaker.

properties.name: resilience4j.retry.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Resilience4j's Retry.
